Like-Like decided to go back to the base to see if the master was really
gone, so he changed to beats mode, burrowed underground, and traveled
towards the Destron base. If there was any water, he swam through it, if
there were any mountains, he burrowed right through to take the quickest
path possible...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 10:05 AM
Subject: Re: Here it is. Good-Bye Destrons.


> OOC: The Destrons will always be yours Dachande but I don't think they
should
> stop existing during your absence.
>
> ::Cygnar::
>     He received the message from Magmatron.  He was still looking for
> Optimus.  He had failed.  He was unworthy.  He flew to the base but did
not
> enter.  He felt that staying here was a fitting punishment.  He would
rebuild
> the Destrons so that if Magmatron ever returned he would find them better
> than when he left.  He circled over the base waiting to see if anyone else
> would stay.
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
